episodes.title: Gordon Off the Rails - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, Gordon the big express engine is upset when he has to pull a train of trucks. In an attempt to get out of taking the trucks he tries to jam the turntable, but gets far more than he bargained for. Find out more in this Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, read by Voice Director Sharon Miller.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and Bruno - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, Bruno and Diesel find themselves stuck in an avalanche after Diesel doesn't listen to Bruno's advice. Will the two friends escape? Find out in today's story read by writer Daniel Share-Strom.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Christmas Party - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
Lifelong Thomas fan Daniel Long reads the story of how Thomas and all of his friends get together to say "thank you" to a nice old lady just in time for Christmas. Tune in to today’s festive Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids to find out more. 

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Percy and Harold - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, Mark Moraghan reads the Story of when Harold the Helicopter was showing off, so Percy and his driver decided to surprise him. 

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Percy and the Calliope - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
Percy and Diesel are delivering a very old musical organ to the smelters yard. But Percy thinks it's special and tries to make it play music again. Tune in to today’s music-themed Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, read by Series Producer Ian McCue, to find out more.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Henry and the Wishing Tree - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
Series writers, Paul Larson and Abi Grant, read the story of Henry, who finds a Wishing Tree and makes a wish. But soon Henry discovers that sometimes you have to be careful what you wish for! Listen to today’s Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids to find out more!

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Train - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas is super excited to get the chance to pull his very own train, but things don't quite go to plan in this hilarious Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, read by the UK Voice of Thomas, John Hasler.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and Bertie - Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast story for kids, Mark Chambers, grandson of the Rev W Awdry, reads how Thomas the Tank Engine and Bertie the Bus decided to stage their own version of the Great Race. 

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary podcast series on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2025 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Resilient Engines - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Emily, Caitlin, Nia and Rebecca. In this Thomas & Friends™ compilation story, these engines show their power by facing challenges, making discoveries and getting the job done! They keep on chugging, no matter what. Listen and learn with these funny, heartwarming railway stories for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Christmas Animals Special: Animal Families - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Family and friends are especially important at Christmas. On Sodor, that includes the animals! This holiday-themed compilation story for kids shows how Thomas and his friends make Christmas better for the animal families of Sodor.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Christmas Special Compilation: Presents and Nutcrackers - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
There’s Christmas cheer for all to hear in this Thomas & Friends™ holiday compilation story for kids! Tune in for stories about Christmas kindness for an old coffee pot engine, Percy’s perfect present and even a Nutcracker-themed Thomas & Friends™ fairy tale!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Night Before Christmas  - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: T'is the night before Christmas and Thomas has too much to do! So many deliveries to make, he's worried he'll miss Santa! Will he make it back to Tidmouth Sheds in time? Tune in to this Thomas & Friends™ holiday podcast and see! For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Christmas Rescue Special: Saving the Holiday- Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Missing Christmas decorations, too much snow and falling through the ice! Instead of ho-ho-ho, this Thomas & Friends Christmas compilation story is full of oh-no-no! Will Thomas and his friends save the holiday? Tune in and find out!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Super Loop  - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Trying new things is never easy. When Thomas asks Percy to try the Loop-de-loop track, Thomas forgets that Carly and Sandy taught him how to do it. Fun? Yes. Easy? No. Will Percy give it a try? Stay looped in on this Thomas & Friends™ podcast to find out!
For more kids’ stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime Podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify® and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. © 2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Christmas Fun Special: Happy Holidays- Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
This Thomas & Friends Christmas compilation story is filled with special deliveries—letters to Santa, holiday packages and more. Thomas even helps Santa (aka Sir Topham Hatt) deliver Christmas joy after his sleigh slips down the hill! Tune in for all the holiday fun!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Halloween Special Compilation: Dinosaurs and Pumpkins- Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Tune in for all the tricks & treats in this Halloween-themed Thomas & Friends™ compilation story for kids! Sodor seems spooky, what with missing pumpkins, eery dinosaur sightings and other Halloween hijinx. Find out what happens!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Ghost Train - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Legend says the Ghost Train rides on Halloween – and Percy does not want to meet it while delivering the mail! Thomas joins Percy to help him face his fears, but things get spooky when an eerie figure seems to be following them! Learn the secret of the Ghost Train in today’s thrilling Thomas & Friends™ podcast for kids!

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Frog Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: When Thomas agrees to be friends with a frog, he’s in for a big surprise! What’s the surprise? Tune in to this fairy tale-inspired Thomas & Friends™ podcast story to find out! For more kids's stories, subscribe amd listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.

episodes.title: Bruno's Great Pig Problem - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: Bruno never thought he liked pigs. So what happens when one shows up in his hay delivery? Tune in to this Thomas & Friends™ podcast to see this unlikely friendship begin! For more kids's stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Back to School Special Compilation: Listen & Learn - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
How can school children go to class without a classroom? How many wheels does it take to give special guests a ride? And how can Thomas and Percy help Stafford fit in? Listen and learn the answers in this back-to-school Thomas & Friends™ compilation story for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Tiger Train- Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ podcast story for kids, Thomas is green with envy when a visiting engine receives loads of attention for the brave tiger painted on his tender. When his plan to prove who’s really the bravest engine falls apart, Thomas has to set aside his jealousy and work together with Yong Bao to get them both home safely.
For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: A Fairytale Special Compilation: Once Upon a Train - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
A toymaker and a wooden train, Thomas and the seven tiny engines, and three little engines building their sheds before a big bad storm. Three favorite fairy tales re-told with a Thomas twist! Tune in to this special Thomas & Friends™ story compilation for fairy tale fun.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Friendship Special Compilation: Helping Friends - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Friends stick together (sometimes literally!). They help each other. And best friends are just the best! That’s what kids will see in this compilation of podcast stories about friendship from Thomas and his friends! Tune in for friendship and fun!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Letting Off Steam - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
No one likes to be laughed at. When embarrassing incidents cause Thomas and Percy to lose their cool, the argument that follows may derail their friendship. Will some advice from Nia get the buddies back on track? Find out in today’s Thomas & Friends™ railway podcast story for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Counting Cows - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas and Percy think delivering 10 cows to McColl’s Farm sounds easy and fun, so the engines do more playing than paying attention along the way. Find out what happens when some of the cows go missing in today’s Thomas & Friends™ storytime podcast for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Music is Everywhere - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Bad luck strikes a sour note when Thomas and Nia head to a classical music concert. The orchestra’s instruments fail to arrive and a broken drawbridge leaves Nia stranded! Will the show go on? Tune in to today’s music-themed Thomas & Friends™ railway podcast story to find out! 

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Summer Special Compilation: Summertime on Sodor - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
From heat wave to high seas adventure, summer on Sodor is a whale of a good time! Join Thomas and his friends in this summertime story compilation as they search for a mermaid, battle the blazing summer sun and work together to help save a whale!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: A Quiet Delivery - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ podcast bedtime story, Annie and Clarabel need to rest before an overnight service run, so Thomas volunteers to get them across Sodor while they sleep. But being quiet is hard when there are so many interesting (and noisy) things along the way! Can the No. 1 engine (quietly) complete his delivery without waking them up?

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Who's behind the Mystery? - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Secrets are revealed in this compilation of Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories. Tune in to uncover the truth behind some of Sodor’s biggest mysteries, from a super-secret identity to a mystery cleanup crew to an imaginary engine!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Magic Lamp - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this fairytale-inspired podcast story, Thomas is granted five wishes by a Magic Lamp. One by one, his wishes come true! Good for him, but not for his friends. Tune in to see what Thomas realizes—and does with his very last wish.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Great Easter Egg Hunt - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Sodor’s Grand Easter Parade is about to begin when the Easter Bunny reveals she’s lost all her eggs! Can Percy, Thomas, and their Biggest Adventure Club friends follow the clues and help recover them all in time? Tune in to this holiday-themed railway story for kids to find out eggsactly what happens!
For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Tall Tales and Machines - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
After Thomas tells his friends the tale of Jack and the Beanstalk, he dreams that he’s been transported into the land of the giants. Then he’s off on a noble quest to help fix a mistake in the next story. After a railway bridge collapses, Inventor Ruth will have the chance to be a hero and help Toby and Henrietta. Find out how these tales turn out in this Thomas & Friends™ podcast for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Animal Stories Special: Animal Friends - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Join Thomas in this compilation of stories as he gets wrapped up in some monkey troubles when the new Sodor Animal Park opens. He’ll try to solve a mystery to reunite a mama tiger with her baby. Then Thomas decides to help a dog he meets along the railway. Can Thomas help all these animal friends?
For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts. ©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Pop a Wheelie - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Mischief rides the Sodor rails in today’s Thomas & Friends™ podcast for kids. The Troublesome Trucks tag along with Thomas and Diesel on an important delivery, but a bad decision leaves Diesel sidetracked with a broken wheel. Can the friends find a safe way to finish the job? Listen to find out!

For more kids' stories, subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts®, Spotify®, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & Friends™ Storytime 2022 Trailer
episodes.description:
From the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast, it’s All Engines Go, with abso-toot-ly awesome new adventures! As Thomas and his friends work together to RACE into action and use the sounds of the railway to create Marvellous Music! And so much more.
Subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends™ Storytime on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2022 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Elves - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
In this fairy tale-themed Thomas & Friends™ story for kids, Sir Topham Hatt has tasked Thomas with cleaning up the rail yard, but a secret someone keeps getting the job done before Thomas arrives. To solve the mystery, Thomas hides in the yard overnight and makes a startling discovery. Listen to find out what happens!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Perfect Gift - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
It’s Christmastime and the Island of Sodor is decked out in festive decorations; everywhere, except at the scrap yard. Worried his friend Reg is missing out on the Yuletide fun, Percy tries to find the perfect gift that’ll bring holiday cheer to the gloomy rail yard. Listen to find out what happens in this Christmas-themed Thomas & Friends™ story for kids. 
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Nutcracker - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
It’s Christmas Eve on the Island of Sodor! All the engines are enchanted by the festive decorations, and Thomas is fascinated by a tall wooden soldier standing guard near the Christmas tree. As Tidmouth Sheds goes to sleep for the night, Thomas embarks on a magical journey to the Land of Sweets to help rescue the Sugar Plum Fairy from the evil Mouse King. Listen to find out what happens in this Nutcracker-themed Thomas & Friends™ story for kids!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Christmas Coffee Pot - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
When Marion the railway steam shovel discovers an old coffee pot engine named Glynn buried under snow, the No. 1 engine Thomas comes up with a plan to save Glynn. Can the senior steamer avoid being scrapped? Find out in this Christmas-themed Thomas & Friends™ story for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: A Cranky Christmas - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
It’s holiday time on the Island of Sodor, and Sir Topham Hatt is expecting an important package. But when Thomas arrives to pick up the delivery, Cranky the Crane™ reveals a problem. Can the railway friends find and deliver the cargo in time for Christmas? Find out in this festive Thomas & Friends™ story for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Steam Team Tales - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Kids can hear all about their favourite Steam Team members in this compilation of Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories. Learn about the first adventures of Thomas the tank engine and his friends, and hear how each engine came to feel at home on the island of Sodor.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Percy and the Enormous Pumpkin - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
It’s Halloween on Sodor and Sir Topham Hatt is hoping his pumpkin will take first prize at the island’s competition. However, when Percy arrives to pick up the pumpkin for delivery, he runs into a BIG problem. Can Percy get the giant cargo to the fair? Tune in and find out in this festive Thomas & Friends™ railway story for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Spooky Sodor Tales - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Things on Sodor are about to get spooky in this compilation of Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories. From mysterious dinosaurs and glowing ghost trains to a Steam Troll who lives under a bridge, these kid-friendly stories bring some spine-tingling Halloween fun to storytime.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Flatbeds of Fear - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
When the engines start to hear spooky noises while unloading a delivery at Brendam Docks, Salty the Dockside Diesel engine convinces everyone it’s the Flatbeds of Fear. Should the railway friends be worried? Find out in this Halloween-themed Thomas & Friends™ story for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Two Wheels Good - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
Does having more wheels make an engine race faster? In today’s Thomas & Friends™ railway story for kids, Bertie, Thomas and Spencer argue over who has the right number of wheels to carry some very special guests to their destination on time.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Fuzzy Friend - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
When Thomas comes upon a lost dog during a journey along the rails, the No. 1 engine works to find a home for his new four-legged friend. Listen and find out what happens in this Thomas & Friends™ railway story for kids.
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Inventors Spectacular Bridge - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, engines Toby and Henrietta become trapped on the other side of the ravine. Can Inventor Ruth help save the day? Tune in to this Thomas & Friends™ railway story for kids to find out!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Three Cranes - Thomas & Friends Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ podcast story for kids, Thomas finds out he caused an accident at the docks that damaged one of the crane’s hooks! Feeling terrible, the No. 1 engine awakes in the night and embarks on a noble quest to bring back the Golden Hook and make things right with his friends. Listen and find out what happens!
For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Down at the Docks - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this compilation of Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories, kids can travel down to Brendam Docks and meet some heavy-lifting railway friends. Hear how Thomas and Percy first met Cranky the Crane, and find out what happens when some of Sodor’s other hard-working residents try to help Cranky with all that loading and unloading of cargo.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: School of Duck - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When a terrible storm destroys the classroom at Harwick School, Duck the tank engine has to get creative to find a solution in this Thomas & Friends™ podcast story. Listen along to find out how the clever train applies the principles of recycling to help the school children get to their lessons!

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Dizzy Diesels - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Listen to this Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast compilation for kids and learn about Diesel's first day on Sodor. Sing along with Sidney as he gets himself in a spin and worries he'll forget what his job was. And see Diesel go all dizzy over some cute little springtime ducklings.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Train, Planes and Rescues - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Kids can discover some of Sodor’s sights beyond the rails in this compilation of Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories. Listen along as Thomas meets interesting new friends, including vintage wartime airplanes and brave Toby the tram engine, and find out what happens when a rescue crane needs his own rescue! Plus, Thomas learns what’s on the other side of the mountain.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Buckled Tracks and Bumpy Trucks - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s Thomas & Friends™ Storytime, it's the hottest day of the year on Sodor. While Sir Topham Hatt gets a new white hat to protect him from the sun’s rays, the heat causes the railway’s tracks to buckle and bend leading to a fiery situation for Whiff the tank engine. 

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Seven Tiny Engines - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Green with envy after a magic mirror proclaims Thomas is the number-one engine on Sodor, James sends Thomas away to the mainland to collect some pretend cargo. Thomas soon becomes lost and stumbles across a small railway yard, where he meets seven tiny mining engines. Will the tiny engines help Thomas get back home to Sodor? Find out in this fairy tale-inspired story for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Emily's Best Friend - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Kids can discover the what being a good friend is all about in this heartwarming Thomas & Friends™ story. Emily worries she doesn’t have a best friend on Sodor, but when the other engines help her out of a tricky situation, she realises she’s been surrounded by best friends all along.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Best Engine Ever - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
From a breakdown on the rails to a high-speed brake rescue, steam engines Emily and Caitlin discover you don’t have to be the “best” to be a valuable member of the team in this heartwarming Thomas & Friends™ story.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Skiff and the Mermaid - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: In today’s nautical-themed story for kids, Skiff and Sir Topham Hatt hit the high seas in search of a mythical mermaid. Find out what happens!

episodes.title: Thomas and the Baby Tiger rescue - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
A baby tiger is lost somewhere on the island of Sodor! Can Thomas and his friends rescue the baby and bring it safely back to its mother at the Sodor Animal Park? Find out in this action-packed, railway adventure story.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Chases and Races - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this compilation of funny Thomas & Friends™ podcast stories, kids can race along with Thomas and James in a friendly competition, hear Annie and Clarabel discover what going fast really feels like, and help Thomas and the residents of Sodor chase down a runaway gingerbread train!

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Chucklesome Trucks - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Everyone expects the worst when Rebecca has to work with the Troublesome Trucks to make her deliveries on Sodor. Find out what happens when the trickster trucks try to de-rail her day in this funny Thomas & Friends™ story.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & Percy Stick Together - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Things get sticky when Thomas and his best friend Percy go racing and chasing on the tracks, have a crash, and get stuck together. How will they get their jobs done stuck to each other? Listen and find out what happens in this funny Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Royal Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this special Thomas & Friends™ podcast story, kids can travel to London with Thomas and Sir Topham Hatt where the duo get lost on their way to a royal appointment. During the railway journey, Thomas catches up with old friends and meets a very important new engine friend. Listen and find out what happens!

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Nia and the Unfriendly Elephant - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
On today's Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast for kids, Nia faces an unusual challenge: an elephant who doesn't like steam engines! Can she deliver the animal to its new home at the Sodor Animal Park? Listen and find out!

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas the Wooden Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
One day a toymaker makes a small wooden train. He names it Thomas and wishes it were a real train. That night while the toymaker is asleep, a fairy brings the toy train to life, and the little wooden engine's adventures begin. Tune in for this magical, fairy tale-themed Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast for kids.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: James the Super Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today’s comic book-inspired story, James discovers he can be a super-engine hero and styles himself as The Rail Rocket. Find out what happens when The Rail Rocket races into action across Sodor!

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Animal Friends - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Kids are in for a wild ride in today’s Thomas & Friends™ railway story. When Thomas arrives to help out at the Sodor Animal Park, he discovers the park’s new residents have escaped and are running amok at the docks! Can he get them rounded up and returned home? Plus, Sir Topham Hatt has an exotic idea to help promote the new monkey habitat, which leaves Thomas feeling embarrassed. Can his friends cheer him up?

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! ©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & Friends™ Storytime 2021 Trailer
episodes.description:
From the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast. New stories for kids are coming down the track! Join Thomas for classic adventures. Listen to new railway retellings of famous fairy tales, and so much more.
Subscribe and listen to Thomas & Friends Storytime on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts.
©2021 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Diesel and the Ducklings - Episode 44 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Diesel's kind to some cute little ducklings, he's worried he'll be teased by the other engines. But he soon learns that his friends like him for simply being him.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Banjo and the Bushfire - Episode 43 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas helps rescue a koala from a bushfire in the Australian rainforest.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Luke’s New Friend - Episode 42 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
One day at the Blue Mountain Quarry, Luke finds a scared young deer. The other engines warn Luke that the quarry is no place for an animal, but when Luke remembers how he scared he was when he first arrived on Sodor he's determined to help the deer feel safe. 

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: New Crane on the Dock - Episode 41 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When a new crane, Carly, joins the docks, she and Cranky both try to outdo each other, causing confusion and delay. 

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Henry in the Dark - Episode 40 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Henry gets repainted at the Steamworks, he doesn't realize its with the wrong paint. But as it gets dark, Henry starts to glow, and Thomas, James, and Gordon are convinced they've seen a ghost train.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Big Bad Storm - Episode 39 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When the three little engines, Thomas, Emily, and James, are given a chance to have their very own sheds built, they each choose different ways to make them. But then a Big Bad Storm arrives and tries to huff and puff and blow their houses down.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Steam Troll - Episode 38 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Reg tells Thomas the tale of a Steam Troll who lives under the old bridge near the yard. Thomas laughs at Reg's story, but when he arrives at the bridge, he is shocked to see a giant Steam Troll blocking his way across the bridge.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & the Gingerbread Train - Episode 37 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
It's Sir Topham Hatt's birthday, and Thomas has asked the baker to create a special gingerbread train as a gift. But the Gingerbread Train comes to life and, terrified of being eaten, escapes down the track. Thomas is joined by various animals and characters in a chase to get the Gingerbread Train back.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Sidney Sings - Episode 36 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Sidney, the diesel, is given a special job, he worries he might forget to do it, so Thomas helps him make up a song to remember.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Dinosaurs - Episode 35 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas the Tank Engine isn’t afraid of anything … or is he? When dinosaurs are spotted on the Island of Sodor, it’s another engine who turns out to be the bravest of all.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Dragon - Episode 34 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas gets worried when he's given the honour of bringing a dragon to the Chinese New Year celebrations.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Other Side of the Mountain - Episode 33 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Bertie the Bus tells Thomas about the amazing sights on the other side of the mountain, Thomas wants to see for himself. But Thomas can only go where there are tracks and soon gets into trouble.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Red vs Blues - Episode 32 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
The Sodor football fans wear blue and cheer for Thomas, while Barrow fans wear red and cheer for James. Soon the two engines are competing with each other.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Beast of Sodor - Episode 31 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Spencer delights in teasing a worried Henry about the abominable snowman, but when they meet a man covered from head to toe in snow, it is Spencer who is the most frightened of all.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Terence Breaks the Ice - Episode 30 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Terence the tractor shows off to Thomas that he can go anywhere. But when Terence falls through a frozen pond, it is Thomas who has to save him!

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas and the Fairy God Engine - Episode 29 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
It's the King's locomotive ball, and all the engines on Sodor are invited to dress up and join a grand parade. But Thomas has too much work to do and ends up covered in dirt and soot. It will take a spark of magic from a Fairy God Engine to ensure Thomas goes to the ball.

Listen and subscribe to the TThomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Kangaroo Christmas - Episode 27 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas is shocked to learn that Christmas in Australia is actually in summer. He goes on an adventure to reunite a baby kangaroo with its mother and learns the importance of family at Christmas.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas' Animal Ark - Episode 28 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
The boiler at the Animal Park breaks down at Christmas, so Thomas and his friends need to find a way to keep the animals warm.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Christmas in the Air - Episode 25 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
On Christmas Eve, Thomas the Tank Engine sees his engine friends with all sorts of special deliveries. Where are they all going? Thomas wonders. Thomas soon discovers that his friends have brought everything for the Christmas Eve party!

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Last Train for Christmas - Episode 26 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
It is a snowy Christmas Eve, and a lot of passengers are coming home to Sodor for the holidays. But the snow keeps falling and threatens to keep everyone from getting home in time for Christmas. Soon all the engines have to work together to save the holiday.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Santa's Little Engine - Episode 24 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
It's Christmas time on Sodor, and Sir Topham Hatt is dressed as Santa for the fair. But when his sleigh slips down the hill, with him still in it, it's up to Thomas to save the day.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Letters to Santa - Episode 23 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
With Christmas fast approaching, Percy and Harold help each other to get the children's letters to Santa in time. 

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Missing Christmas Decorations - Episode 22 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When the Steamies’ Christmas decorations go missing from Tidmouth Sheds, it's Percy that discovers who is stealing them. The Steamies team up to get the decorations back.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Rocky Rescue - Episode 21 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Rocky, the mobile rescue crane, has an accident, it's up to the other rescue vehicles to save him. But can they learn to work together as a team?

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas the Hero - Episode 20 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Thomas sees a vintage plane flying overhead, he is fascinated and follows it to the airfield. There he meets many wonderful planes and learns all about the part they played in the war. Thomas wishes he could be a hero too. 

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Cranky the Crane - Episode 19 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas and Percy enjoy working at Brendam Docks until they meet a new bossy crane called Cranky. He is mean and rude to them and calls the two little engines bugs! But when an accident knocks Cranky to the ground, it is the two little engines who come to his rescue.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Not so Slow Coaches - Episode 18 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Annie and Clarabel are always complaining to Thomas about going too fast. But when Annie and Clarabel find themselves coupled to Caitlin by mistake, they get a taste of what going fast is really like.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of James the Funny Engine - Episode 17 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
James is so proud of his new shiny red paintwork. He believes it makes him the smartest, funniest, and most useful engine on the railway. But when James plays a trick on Gordon, he soon learns that not all jokes are funny.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Toby the Tram Engine - Episode 16 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Sir Topham Hatt's new tram engine Toby is not fancy-looking like the other steam engines; he is brown and square. But he soon proves that its what's on the inside that counts when he bravely saves King Godred's crown.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Toad and the Whale - Episode 15 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
When Oliver’s brake van, Toad, spots a stranded whale on the beach, they alert the Search and Rescue Centre. Everyone must work together to help save the whale.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Emily the Clever Engine - Episode 14 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Emily's first day on Sodor doesn't start well when she takes Thomas' coaches by mistake. But when Emily saves Thomas from a possible crash, the other engines all see that Emily is both brave and clever.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Who's Geoffrey - Episode 13 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Thomas causes a small accident by being silly and he is so embarrassed that he blames it on someone else… an imaginary engine called Geoffrey. Follow along as Thomas learns an important life lesson about telling the truth.

For more kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Diesel the Diesel Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this week's storytime, when a new diesel engine called Diesel arrives on the island of Sodor, he thinks he is far too modern and special to be told what to do by an old steam engine. But when he gets into trouble, he soon realizes that it helps to listen.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your kids' podcasts! 
 ©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Gordon the Big Engine - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Gordon is known for taking things too seriously, but one day he can't stop laughing and is worried Sir Topham Hatt will think he is a silly engine. In this episode of Thomas & Friends Storytime, Gordon soon learns that sometimes having fun is ok. 
 
For more of your favourite kids' stories, subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
 ©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Marion and the Dinosaurs - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this episode of the Thomas & Friends Storytime podcast, when Marion the Steam Shovel sees a long line of dinosaurs, she thinks it must be a dream! But then the dinosaurs return, and Marion is chased all the way up to the castle.

For more kids' stories, listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Nia the Helpful Engine - Episode 9 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
Nia is a helpful and resourceful engine who is good at solving difficult problems. In this episode of Thomas & Friends Storytime, she soon learns that even helpful engines sometimes need to ask for help.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your kids' podcasts!  
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Big World, Big Adventures! - Episode 8 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today's storytime for kids, Thomas embarks on an ambitious trip around the world and discovers magnificent new sights and cultures, as well as making friends with a fun Kenyan engine named Nia. 

For more of your favourite kids' stories, listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Rebecca the Happy Engine - Episode 7 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this week's storytime, yellow and caring engine Rebecca is new to the Island of Sodor and works very hard to fit in. Rebecca is worried that unlike the other engines, there is nothing special about her, but her new friends soon help her discover her unique qualities. 

For more kids' stories, listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Percy the Small Engine - Episode 6 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this episode of the Thomas & Friends Storytime podcast, the big engines are causing trouble when they refuse to come out of their sheds, so Sir Topham Hatt enlists the help of a small green engine named Percy.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your kids' podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Kevin's Cranky Friend - Episode 5 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today's storytime, Cranky the Crane is very busy down at Brendam Docks, so Sir Topham Hatt decides to send Kevin from the Steamworks to help him. But Cranky doesn’t want any help, and Kevin has to work extra hard to prove he can be Really Useful.

For more online stories, listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: The Story of Thomas The Tank Engine - Episode 3 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: In this episode of Thomas & Friends™ Storytime, Thomas works every day in the yard collecting coaches for the big engines. But the little tank engine has big dreams of pulling coaches on his very own branch line.

episodes.title: Happy Birthday Thomas - Episode 4 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In this week's Thomas & Friends Storytime, when Bertie won't race with Thomas and Sir Topham Hatt sends him to the Steamworks, Thomas thinks he's not a Really Useful Engine anymore. But little does he know that Sir Topham Hatt and the rest of his friends are planning a surprise party to celebrate his birthday!

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your kids' podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Steamie Stafford - Episode 1 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description: In this week's Thomas & Friends™ Storytime, Stafford doesn’t run on coal and water like the steam engines. Instead, he runs off a battery, which is very quiet. So when Stafford overhears some children saying he doesn’t sound like a proper engine, he asks Thomas and Percy to teach him how to make the same chuffing sounds they do.

episodes.title: Thomas & the Beanstalk - Episode 2 - Thomas & Friends™ Storytime
episodes.description:
In today's Thomas & Friends Storytime podcast, Thomas tells his friends the story of "Jack and the Beanstalk" before bedtime. The next day, while carrying a load of beans, Thomas has an accident and dreams about riding up a giant beanstalk to a land of giants high above the clouds.

Listen and subscribe to the Thomas & Friends™ Storytime podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever else you listen to your kids' podcasts!
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & Friends™ Storytime Season 1 Trailer
episodes.description:
Join Thomas and his friends on a new adventure in Thomas & Friends™ Storytime, a new podcast series for kids featuring stories from the magical island of Sodor! 
Updating each week, Thomas & Friends™ Storytime will feature special origin stories of your favourite engines, magical fairy tales, and so much more.
Listen and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 
©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.

episodes.title: Thomas & the Monkey Palace [Sneak Peek!]
episodes.description:
Here's a special sneak peek episode of our new podcast series for kids, Thomas & Friends Storytime! Our official launch is May 12, 2020, so stay tuned!

Thomas is pulling a cargo load of coconuts when he discovers an old palace and encounters some cheeky monkeys. 

If you liked what you've heard, please leave us a review. Listen and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever else you listen to your podcasts! 

©2020 Gullane (Thomas) Limited.
